text: "All Lit Up in Love" is a song written and recorded by American country music artist David Lee Murphy. It was released in July 1997 as the first single from the album We Can't All Be Angels. The song reached #25 on the Billboard Hot Country Singles & Tracks chart. ==Chart performance== {|class="wikitable sortable" !Chart (1997) !Peak position |- |- |Canadian RPM Country Tracks |align="center"|21 |} ==References== Category:1997 singles Category:1997 songs Category:Songs written by David Lee Murphy Category:Song recordings produced by Tony Brown (record producer) Category:MCA Nashville Records singles Category:David Lee Murphy songs
title: All Lit Up in Love
